quest.name: Gone Like the Morning Dew
journal: Though his face betrays little sign of panic, Hien is plainly desperate to find Yotsuyu before something terrible happens.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Without Tsuyu, I cannot see how the prisoner exchange─or indeed the peace process at large─can proceed. We have to find her, and soon.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Her memory must have returned. Why else would she run?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: It seems Tsuyu has gone unrecognized thus far, but kami help us if someone catches a clear view of her face. I must find her before that happens.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: The responsibility for her disappearance─for all of this─lies with me. But I would ask for your aid nonetheless.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We are at your service, Lord Hien, now as before. Let us make the crossing and begin our search.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You go on ahead. Someone should let Yugiri know what we've learned. I'll join you on the other side.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We have no way of knowing where Tsuyu is headed, so we had best divide our forces. I will take Kusakari and its surrounds; Alphinaud, if you would take the road to Castrum Fluminis?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Forename─forgive me, but could I ask you to interrogate the residents of Yuzuka Manor? One of the Namazu may well have seen our quarry.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: If everyone is in agreement, let us board the skiff, and hope the kami smile upon our efforts!

dialogue.name: GYOSAN
dialogue.text: Welcome to Yuzuka Manor. Yes, yes. If there is anything you care to know, you need only─ Hm? A pale-skinned woman?

dialogue.name: GYOSAN
dialogue.text: I have seen no such traveler, I am sorry to say. Most sorry. Scaly-skinned Namazu, on the other hand, we have in abundance!

dialogue.name: GYOKU
dialogue.text: ...Unusually pale skin? Yes, yes! I saw this woman on the way back from my fishing trip.

dialogue.name: GYOKU
dialogue.text: She had just crossed the shallows east of here, and was headed in a northeasterly direction...for the most part. Her steps did not seem certain. If you hurry, you might still catch her.

dialogue.name: GYOSAN
dialogue.text: No, no. Still no pale-skinned females here. Only grey.

dialogue.name: GYOKU
dialogue.text: I thought you would be on your way by now. Did you lose interest in finding your friend?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You see no sign of Yotsuyu to the north. Perhaps she is somewhere farther off to the northeast...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Still no sign of Yotsuyu. Perhaps she is yet farther to the northeast...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Yotsuyu is nowhere to be seen, but lying on the ground a short distance to the north, you spy a familiar-looking wide-brimmed hat...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A cursory glance is all that is required to confirm your suspicions: it is the same hat Yotsuyu was wearing when you found her in Sakazuki.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: Forename! Before you ask, our search of Kusakari and its surroundings has yielded exactly naught─save this chance reunion with you, I suppose.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Mistress Alisaie has gone to assist her brother at the castrum. It was she who informed me of the situation. I joined Lord Hien here shortly thereafter.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: How did you fare at Yuzuka Manor? Any sign of our missing guest?

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: ...Towards Namai? By the kami! If the villagers recognize her, it will not end well.

dialogue.name: HIEN
dialogue.text: We must hurry. Yugiri and I will check the paddies; the village square is yours!
